text: @GOP @GOPChairwoman The same candidate who's responsible for *no* Covid19 response and 153,000+ dead Americans? The same candidate running the show *now* during all the rioting and civil unrest? The same candidate who told everyone to listen to a witch doctor? #25thAmendmentNow #TrumpDeathToll153K
